review: I am a huge ship.  Imagine having an entire book devoted toward actively avoiding you and your kind.  I have always been bigger than other ships - and yes, I have endured years of being moared in the distance, never being able to enter the shallower bays, requiring tugs to guide me in - but now THIS!  Mr. Trimmer, you sir, should be ashamed!  Please do not be swayed by his drivel.  I ask that you judge me not by the size of my cargo hatch but rather the content of my wheelhouse.
